name: IG/IRL
description:
!!! TURN ON FULLSCREEN TO HAVE THE ENTIRE GAME ON ITCH.IO !!!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 37. The theme was "One room".

You are getting back home and you finally have time for some intense gaming session. However, the entire world seems to be against you: your mom wants you to go outside, people are calling you, the window opens... You will have to manage all these problems in your room to be able to play.

The controls are:

- WASD to control the alien in the game.

- Mouse to react to events and eat (because you did buy stuff before locking yourself inside your room).

Do not forget to eat if you want to be strong enough to play but do not eat too much.

When you have things to do in your room, you are not able to play anymore. So, be fast enough!

DO NOT FORGET TO EAT, OTHERWISE IT SLOWS YOUR GAMING CAPABILITIES !
